item.description:
Ok, we'll try it one more week. The sun is setting pretty early these days so we may not be able to continue the thursday evening walks much longer.

I suggest bringing a head lamp or flashlight to see, and be seen. plus, it's hard to pick up poop in the dark, right!

we'll just play it by ear for the next couple of weeks, and as interest dwindles with the sunlight, we can put our walk on hold until the spring and join a few of the weekend meetups during the fall.

hope to see you thursday, have a great week.

melissa and isabelle

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Dorrs Pond @ Livingston Park, Manchester
